Song.title: Forever Reign
Song.copyright: Jason Ingram | Reuben Morgan Â© 2009 Hillsong Music Publishing (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: You are g[C]ood You are good When there's nothing good in me You are [G/B]love You are love On display for all to see You are [C]light You are light When the darkness closes in You are [G/B]hope You are hope You have covered all my sin [C]
Verse 2: You are [C]peace You are peace When my fear is crippling You are [G/B]true You are true Even in my wandering You are [C]joy You are joy You're the reason that I sing You are [G/B]life You are life In You death has lost its sting [C]
Chorus: [C](Oh) I'm running to Your [C/G]arms I'm running to Your [Am]arms The riches of Your love will [G]always be en[F]ough Nothing com[Am]pares to [G]Your emb[F]race Light of the [Am]world for[G]ever r[F]eign [(C going into chorus)]
{new_page} Verse 3: You are [C]more You are more Than my words will ever say You are [G]Lord You are Lord All creation will proclaim You are [C]here You are here In Your presence I'm made whole You are [G]God You are God Of all else I'm letting go [C]
Bridge: [Am] My heart will sing [F] no other Name [C] Jesus [G] Jesus (REPEAT 4X)
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 you are good you are good when theres nothing good in me you are love you are love on display for all to see you are light you are light when the darkness closes in you are hope you are hope you have covered all my sin verse 2 you are peace you are peace when my fear is crippling you are true you are true even in my wandering you are joy you are joy youre the reason that i sing you are life you are life in you death has lost its sting chorus oh im running to your arms im running to your arms the riches of your love will always be enough nothing compares to your embrace light of the world forever reign verse 3 you are more you are more than my words will ever say you are lord you are lord all creation will proclaim you are here you are here in your presence im made whole you are god you are god of all else im letting go bridge my heart will sing no other name jesus jesus repeat 4x
